=== Introduction ===
Security team development is done as time allows. This page does not include security updates, audits, investigations, etc. This page only includes information on proactive development work as it pertains to the Ubuntu Release schedule.

=== Weekly summary ===
We fixed 4 RC bugs, got 3 new ones.
